caddyserver/caddy

Server with automatic HTTPS by default

View on index

Related repos

  • Caddy server config generator with SSL, reverse proxy, and file server options
  • Distributed HTTP cache module for Caddy
  • Automates TLS certificate issuance and renewal for Go programs
  • web UI to manage multiple Caddy servers
  • Web Application Firewall middleware for Caddy with regex filtering, blacklisting, geo-blocking, and monitoring
  • reverse proxy for Docker containers using Caddy and labels
  • HTTP testing tool with HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 support
  • Monitors website uptime and SSL certificate expiration
  • automates getting and renewing HTTPS certificates for web servers
